articles.author: Ankur Banerjee
articles.title: Asian stocks subdued as traders brace for inflation data - Reuters
articles.description: Asian stocks nudged higher on Tuesday, while the dollar wallowed near three-month lows as investors remained convinced the Federal Reserve was done with its rate-hike cycle and looked ahead to a crucial inflation report later this week.
articles.content: SINGAPORE, Nov 28 (Reuters) - Asian stocks nudged higher on Tuesday, while the dollar wallowed near three-month lows as investors remained convinced the Federal Reserve was done with its rate-hike cy… [+4081 chars]

articles.author: Manish Singh
articles.title: Apple partner Foxconn to invest $1.5 billion in India - TechCrunch
articles.description: Foxconn plans to invest $1.54 billion in India, the latest in its growing expansion plan, following a surge in revenues in the South Asian market. Foxconn Foxconn plans to invest $1.54 billion in India, Hon Hai said in a stock exchange filing.

articles.description: Layoffs come as China company intensifies efforts in generative AI
